metadata.smart_level_notes: Level 2-3: Machine-readable. Reporting requirements decomposed into discrete items with semantic classification, data provider attribution, temporal scope, granularity, BSC section references, and ontology candidacy. Functional requirements and validation rules extracted as computable clauses. Calculated data items linked to BSC Section T formulae.
metadata.bsc_section_reference: Section V, Section X Annex X-1

amendment_history.description: Creation of Document, P372 June 2019 Release

associated_documents.title: Service Description for Balancing Mechanism Reporting
Balancing Mechanism Reporting Agent User Requirements Specification
BSC Section Q: Balancing Mechanism Activities
BSC Section M: Credit Cover and Credit Default

ECVNAA.expansion: Energy Contract Volume Notification Agent Authorisation

MVRNAA.expansion: Metered Volume Reallocation Notification Agent Authorisation

EDT01.expansion: Electronic Data Transfer file reference 01 (NETSO to BMRA)

REMIT.expansion: Regulation on Energy Market Integrity and Transparency

rules.description: Where Sell Price Volume Adjustment (Energy) is non-zero, Buy Price Volume Adjustment (Energy) must be zero, and vice versa
Where Sell Price Volume Adjustment (System) is non-zero, Buy Price Volume Adjustment (System) must be zero, and vice versa
All BMRS data available as table of data as specified in BMRS Specification
Certain cases available as graphic, pictorial or other form
Where possible, BMRS data should be made available in a machine readable format

data_retention.retention_basis: After Settlement Day to which data relates, or day on which forecast data was provided

rules.description: Level 1 Credit Default statement (Section M3.2.6(b)) remains until cancelled by ECVAA
Level 2 Credit Default statement (Section M3.3.3(b)) remains until cancelled by ECVAA
Notice following Trading Dispute resolution (Section M3.5(a)) remains for one month

exempt_supply_reporting.description: Total Exempt Supply Volumes Data available from BMRS via API where received from SAA

Indicative Period BM Unit Offer Cashflow

Indicative Period BM Unit Total Accepted Offer Volume

Indicative Period RR Total Accepted Offer Volume
Indicative Period RR Accepted Bid Volume
Indicative Period RR Accepted Offer Volume

reporting_items.data_description: 2-14 day ahead National Demand forecast (NDFD) - daily peak half hour value
2-14 day ahead Transmission System Demand forecast (TSDFD) - daily peak half hour value
2-14 day ahead daily Generating Plant Demand Margin forecast (OCNMFD) - daily peak half hour value
2-14 day ahead daily Zonal Output Usable for each System Zone - daily peak half hour value
reporting_items.frequency: Daily where provided by the NETSO to a User
reporting_items.granularity: daily peak half hour per zone

reporting_items.data_description: 2-14 day ahead daily Total Output Usable and Total Output Usable (plus expected Interconnector transfer capacity) by Fuel Type Category
reporting_items.frequency: Daily where provided by the NETSO to a User

reporting_items.data_description: 2-14 day ahead daily Output Usable by BM Unit - daily peak half hour value
reporting_items.frequency: Daily where provided by the NETSO to a User
reporting_items.granularity: daily peak half hour per BM Unit

reporting_items.data_description: 2-49 day ahead daily Zonal Output Usable for each System Zone and daily Total Output Usable - daily peak half hour value
reporting_items.frequency: When provided by the NETSO to a User
reporting_items.granularity: daily peak half hour per zone

reporting_items.data_description: 2-52 week ahead National Demand forecast (NDFW) - weekly peak half hour value
2-52 week ahead Transmission System Demand forecast (TSDFW) - weekly peak half hour value
2-52 week ahead weekly Generating Plant Demand Margin forecast (OCNMFW) - weekly peak half hour value
2-52 week ahead weekly Zonal Output Usable for each System Zone - weekly peak half hour value
reporting_items.frequency: Weekly where provided by the NETSO to a User
reporting_items.granularity: weekly peak half hour per zone

reporting_items.data_description: 2-52 week ahead weekly Total Output Usable and Total Output Usable (plus expected Interconnector transfer capacity) by Fuel Type Category
reporting_items.frequency: Weekly where provided by the NETSO to a User

reporting_items.data_description: 2-52 week ahead weekly Output Usable by BM Unit - weekly peak half hour value
reporting_items.frequency: Weekly where provided by the NETSO to a User
reporting_items.granularity: weekly peak half hour per BM Unit

reporting_items.data_description: 1-2 year ahead weekly Zonal Output Usable for each System Zone and weekly Total Output Usable - weekly peak half hour value
reporting_items.frequency: Twice each calendar year at approximately 6 month intervals
reporting_items.granularity: weekly peak half hour per zone

reporting_items.data_description: 3-5 year ahead weekly Zonal Output Usable for each System Zone and weekly Total Output Usable - weekly peak half hour value
reporting_items.frequency: Twice each calendar year at approximately 6 month intervals
reporting_items.granularity: weekly peak half hour per zone

reporting_items.data_description: Data relating to Emergency Acceptances
Day ahead National Demand forecast - value for each half hour

reporting_items.format: Tabular and graphic for D-1, D to D+1. Otherwise tabular
